title: Ping Issues
body: I have been having some issues regarding my ping. It will stay around 30 consistently then spike to 200-400ms for a few seconds then go back down to around 30. I have tried multiple times resetting my internet, closing all applications on my computer but nothing changes. I can play other games and I rarely notice this happen. Any help would be greatly appreciated!

replies.body:
Inconsistency in latency is often caused by changes in your ISP routing to the server. Sometimes local network settings can influence these situations, so I recommend working through our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a starting point. This guide takes you through the most common solutions to this issue. 

Let me know if you noticed any changes after working through those steps.
